content.text: How TO - Background Gradient on Scroll
Learn how to create a gradient background color on scroll.
content.html: Learn how to create a gradient background color on scroll.

content.text: How To Create a Gradient Background on Scroll
Create a linear gradient background color that starts from the top. It starts from teal/green to blue:
content.html: Create a linear gradient background color that starts from the top. It starts from teal/green to blue:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
body {  height: 3000px; /* Used to enable scrolling */  
  background: linear-gradient(55deg, #0fb8ad 0%, #1fc8db 51%, #2cb5e8 85%);}

height: 3000px; /* Used to enable scrolling */  
  background: linear-gradient(55deg, #0fb8ad 0%, #1fc8db 51%, #2cb5e8 85%);

content.code:
body {  height: 3000px; /* Used to enable scrolling */
background: linear-gradient(55deg, #0fb8ad 0%, #1fc8db 51%, #2cb5e8 85%);}
